results.title: Metformin improves FOXP3 mRNA expression through suppression of interferon gamma levels in pristane-induced murine models of lupus
results.text_hl: Background:  A recent study has indicated the potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@lupus@@@ in animal models, but there has been no study evaluating the effect on @CHEMICAL_pristane @CHEMICAL_MESH:C009042 @@@pristane@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@lupus@@@.

results.title: Immunometabolic modulators alleviate vascular dysfunction in mice with systemic lupus erythematosus.
results.text_hl: This study explores whether pharmacological interventions targeting dysfunctional immune cell metabolism can confer vascular protection in a genetic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@SLE@@@. Female NZBWF1 @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@lupus@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, aged 29 weeks, were treated for 4 weeks with either a vehicle (@<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@SLE@@@ group), a combination of @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxy-D-glucose@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@), or @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@.

citations.NLM: Miñano S, Moleón J, González-Correa C, Jiménez R, Gómez-Guzmán M, Martín-Morales N, O'Valle F, Romero M, Toral M, Duarte J. Immunometabolic modulators alleviate vascular dysfunction in mice with systemic lupus erythematosus. Biochem Pharmacol. 2025 Jul 12;241():117154. PMID: 40659125

results.title: Metabolic preconditioning in CD4+ T cells restores inducible immune tolerance in lupus-prone mice
results.text_hl: A 2-week course of @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, when combined with tolerance-inducing therapy anti-@GENE_PTPRC @GENE_19264 @@@CD45RB@@@, prevented renal deposition of autoantibodies for 6 months after initial treatment and restored tolerance induction to allografts in @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@lupus@@@-prone @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Wilson CS, Stocks BT, Hoopes EM, Rhoads JP, McNew KL, Major AS, Moore DJ. Metabolic preconditioning in CD4+ T cells restores inducible immune tolerance in lupus-prone mice JCI Insight. 2021 Oct 8;6(19):. PMID: 34403367
citations.BibTeX: @article{34403367, title={Metabolic preconditioning in CD4+ T cells restores inducible immune tolerance in lupus-prone mice}, author={Wilson CS and Stocks BT and Hoopes EM and Rhoads JP and McNew KL and Major AS and Moore DJ}, journal={JCI Insight}, volume={6}, number={19}}

results.title: Evaluation of the effect of metformin as a radiosensitiser in solid tumours: A systematic review.
results.text_hl: The greatest benefits were observed in @DISEASE_Prostatitis @DISEASE_MESH:D011472 @@@prostate tumors@@@ both in OS and @<m>DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@SLE@@@. Conclusions: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in combination with radiotherapy in @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@solid tumors@@@ is one of the most promising treatments under development in oncology.

citations.NLM: Portillo EGD, Olivares-Hernández A, Gudino LC, Félix LC, Hernández LB, Domínguez LP, Jiménez DL, Sarmiento RG, Morillo EDB, Sánchez EF, Miramontes-Gonzáleze JP. Evaluation of the effect of metformin as a radiosensitiser in solid tumours: A systematic review. Clin Transl Radiat Oncol. 2025 May;52():100930. PMID: 40028423
